data.title: Media Database
data.text: Background and Format: Health Service Journal (HSJ) is the B2B website for all healthcare leaders working in, for, or with the NHS. It seeks to be the only title to cover all aspects of publicly funded healthcare from acute to primary care, specialist services to mental health, commissioning to provision. The website provides news, analysis, best practice information and advice from the most influential people in health, for the most influential people in health. Audience and Readership: HSJ's audience is formed of leaders from both clinical and non-clinical backgrounds and both public and private sectors. The website seeks to unite leaders with their peers through print, online, tablet, mobile, HSJ TV, social media, and face to face at bespoke events, conferences, awards ceremonies and more. Senior level audience includes: Deadline: The website is updated daily so there is also an ongoing deadline. Frequency: Regularly updated. Circulation: Source: Publisher Distribution: Health Service Journal subscribers receive complete access to hsj.co.uk, m.hsj.co.uk and HSJTV. HSJ newsletters are distributed to over 35,000 healthcare professionals. Ad Rates: To discuss advertising opportunities with HSJ email advertising@hsj.co.uk or via their online form https://www.hsj.co.uk/marketing-solutions Other information: Any PRs with stories regarding innovation or best practice in the NHS, use HSJ Solutions, a searchable database of validated best practice from across the service. It can be viewed at www.solutions.hsj.co.uk. The ONLY route in is via HSJâ€™s awards programme, which can be found at www.awards.hsj.co.uk. Any entry that is shortlisted, highly commended or wins will be added to this database, subject to editorial approval. Any PRs looking to explore opportunities for commercially sponsored editorial, should contact Executive Editor or Commercial Director James Clements: james.clements@wilmingtonhealthcare.com Awards: 2017 - PPA Awards, Digital Innovation of the Year (Business Media): HSJ Solutions (winner) 2017 - PPA Awards, Business Information Brand of the Year (nominated) 2017 - AOP Digital Publishing Awards, Best Online Media Property / Brand B2B (winner) 2017 - AOP Digital Publishing Awards, Best Digital Publishing Launch: HSJ Solutions (highly commended) 2017 - AOP Digital Publishing Awards, Digital Sales Team of the Year: Corporate Subscriptions (nominated) 2017 - AOP Digital Publishing Awards, Digital Editorial / Content Development Team of the Year, B2B (highly commended) 2017 - British Media Awards, Sales Team of the Year: HSJ Corporate Subscriptions (nominated) 2015 - AOP Digital Publishing Awards, Website - Business to Business: HSJ intelligence (winner) 2015 - AOP Digital Publishing Awards, Launch (nominated) 2015 - PPA Awards, Business Media Brand of the Year (winner) 2015 - PPA Awards, Business Magazine of the Year (nominated) 2015 - PPA Awards, Gamechanger of the Year (nominated) 2015 - PPA Awards, Event of the Year
